solution_line_template: She sold {num_necklaces} necklaces at ${price_per_necklace} apiece for a total of {num_necklaces}*{price_per_necklace} = $<<{num_necklaces}*{price_per_necklace}={total_necklace_sales}>>{total_necklace_sales}

She sold {num_bracelets} bracelets for ${price_per_bracelet} each for a total of {num_bracelets}*{price_per_bracelet} = $<<{num_bracelets}*{price_per_bracelet}={total_bracelet_sales}>>{total_bracelet_sales}

She sold {num_earrings} earrings for ${price_per_earring_pair} a pair for a total of {num_earrings}*{price_per_earring_pair} = $<<{num_earrings}*{price_per_earring_pair}={total_earring_sales}>>{total_earring_sales}

She sold {num_ensembles} ensembles for ${price_per_ensemble} each for a total of {num_ensembles}*{price_per_ensemble} = $<<{num_ensembles}*{price_per_ensemble}={total_ensemble_sales}>>{total_ensemble_sales}
